parameters.command:
=mkdir -p /data/tmp && \
META="/data/tmp/meta_{{$json.source_id}}.json" && \
OUT="/data/tmp/kb_{{$json.source_id}}.json" && \
ERR="/data/tmp/kb_{{$json.source_id}}.err" && \
cat > "$META" <<'PYDATA'
{{ JSON.stringify({
  source_id: $json.source_id,
  source_name: $json.source_name,
  file_name: $json.file_name,
  file_path: $json.file_path,
  dest_path: $json.dest_path,
  extension: $json.extension,
  source_path: $json.source_path
}) }}
PYDATA
python3 - <<'PY' "$META" || { echo "Bad metadata JSON in $META" >&2; exit 1; }
import sys, json
with open(sys.argv[1],'r',encoding='utf-8') as f:
    json.load(f)
print("OK", file=sys.stderr)
PY
python3 /data/scripts/extract_kb_clinical_guides.py < "$META" > "$OUT" 2> "$ERR" && \
echo "{\"file\":\"$OUT\",\"source_id\":{{$json.source_id}}}" || \
( echo "Extractor failed, see $ERR" >&2; exit 1 )

parameters.query:
WITH j AS (
  SELECT $_json${{ JSON.stringify($json) }}$_json$::jsonb AS j
),
payload AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE((j->>'source_id')::int, (j->>'sourceId')::int) AS source_id,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(j->>'chunk_index','')::int, NULLIF(j->>'chunkIndex','')::int) AS chunk_index,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(j->>'page_number','')::int, 1) AS page_number,
    COALESCE(j->>'content','') AS content,
    j->'embedding' AS emb_json
  FROM j
),
validated AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    CASE
      WHEN jsonb_typeof(p.emb_json) = 'array' THEN (
        SELECT ARRAY_AGG(e.value::float8 ORDER BY e.ordinality)
        FROM jsonb_array_elements(p.emb_json) WITH ORDINALITY AS e(value, ordinality)
      )::vector
      ELSE NULL::vector
    END AS embedding_vec
  FROM payload p
)
INSERT INTO kb_chunks (source_id, chunk_index, page_number, content, embedding)
SELECT
  v.source_id, v.chunk_index, v.page_number, v.content, v.embedding_vec
FROM validated v
WHERE v.source_id IS NOT NULL
  AND v.chunk_index IS NOT NULL
  AND v.chunk_index > 0
ON CONFLICT (source_id, chunk_index) DO UPDATE
SET
  page_number = EXCLUDED.page_number,
  content     = EXCLUDED.content,
  embedding   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.embedding, kb_chunks.embedding)
RETURNING
  kb_chunks.source_id,
  kb_chunks.chunk_index,
  kb_chunks.page_number,
  (kb_chunks.embedding IS NOT NULL) AS has_embedding;

parameters.jsCode:
// Clone Meta: deja pasar tal cual el item con chunk_index/page_number/content y metadatos
return [{ json: $json }];
